about_the_game:
Developer's Note: We're still populating and beautifying this page. Check back for updates!

Kooeh: A Timeless Delight is a heartwarming cosy narrative-driven restaurant management game about rediscovering lost family recipes and reviving the family restaurant. The game embalms the Malaysian gastronomical culture with its rich history.

The Story

You play as a 20-something white-collar worker on a sweet parade to recollect the missing pages in your family recipe book and reinstate the heritage dessert bistro to its former glory. Traverse through an alternate world to meet a colorful cast of anthropomorphic characters from a distant past, discover dessert recipes, and get in touch with an ebbing culture!

What The Game Offers

  • Cook Up A Sweet Parade! - Cook a variety of Malaysian delights and let the citizens of the alternate world judge your skill!

  • Timeless Cafe Management - Serve mouth-watering delights to anthropomorphic animals from the region and operate a timeless dessert cafe!

  • Pen Your Journey - Get to know a colorful cast of characters. Read up their origin stories based on real life facts. Collect memorable moments!

  • Make A Wish - Derived from the infamous wishing tree from the Chinese culture, wish for rare ingredients and more!

name: Kooeh: A Timeless Delight

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD or Intel 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM, Vulkan driver
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
